title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Add a label and edit its font size as "18 points".
OB: When the font size of a label is modified, the height of the label does not change immediately.
EB: The height of the label should adjust automatically when the font size is modified.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to "18 points".
